record.dc:title: 276BN77 McDaniel, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 87BN18. Good male burial, partly flexed, flesh burial on right side, face east and down, legs at right angle to body arms over and in front, head west. Stratum I. Square 12L1. Direction SE.
record.wpa:narrative: Adult male in fair condition, fairly complete. Right radius broken and (knit?), also left.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration available through institution. A hand written word in the remarks section is unintelligible.
